import React, { Component } from 'react'; import API from '../../utils/API' function List(props) { const styles ={ marginLeft:{ marginRight: 1000 } } const deleteHandle = (id) => { API.deleteBook(id) .then(res => this.loadBooks()) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (
Saved Books

  • {props.title}

    Written by: {props.author}

    {props.description}



) } export default List;
